title: ScaleMonk Adapter Params
description: A schema which validates params accepted by the ScaleMonk adapter

video.description: An object defining additional ScaleMonk video parameters

width.description: Width of the screen resolution to decide orientation

height.description: Height of the screen resolution to decide orientation

skipdelay.description: The time to spend before revealing skip button

region.description: A string defining region for choosing the closest ScaleMonk endpoint

mraid_supported.description: A bool config to determine if MRAID is supported by ScaleMonk
